tweet: The #Chrysalis (IOTA 1.5) Public Testnet is live! As we progress towards #IOTA 2.0, we welcome everyone to test and provide feedback on all the key components available, including the new CLI #wallet, faucet, our new js library and more.  https://t.co/NDuWdeTf51

The #Chrysalis Testnet is now open for everyone to participate! Absolutely amazing achievement by the #IOTA Foundation and the Community to officially launch the testnet of what will become the future of IOTA. We have some very exciting upgrades and product releases ahead of us!  https://t.co/1k58U5PxbA
Welcome Tobias Willhauck to the #IOTA Foundation!  https://t.co/4fekZI5yNg #WelcometoIOTA

People underestimate IOTA. But we've quietly been overhauling our network & building an entire toolkit, with Bee node, permanode, new wallet, wallet lib, new core lib, Stronghold, Access, Streams & Identity all on the horizon AND IOTA 2.0 in parallel. #IOTA is coming. Look busy.

„Next up, we will be releasing additional libraries to the testnet (including our core iota rs library), adding support for Stronghold in the wallet rs library and CLI wallet, releasing more documentation, and later Firefly will join the testnet as well.“ #IOTA #DLT  https://t.co/qLNMObpo50
nice! looks like a good week for #iota interested people...

.@iotatoken #Chrysalis public testnet is live 🚀  Chrysalis is an intermediate stage before #IOTA 2.0, which is also known as #Coordicide 😎  We're happy to be here for the #IOTA community and provide smooth and registration-free $IOTA swaps on  https://t.co/RvnIn7WgRs 🔥  https://t.co/4gDGCL2lqJ
#IOTA very soon will be a part of every kind of smart city infrastructure at the rate at which their innovation is proceeding.
IOTA To Rock the Machine Economy Coordicide Can Just be the Beginning  https://t.co/8EQ8beOnLE #IOTA #DLT #m2m
